mapper.update: update user_delivery_address set user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, province_zip = #{province_zip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_zip = #{city_zip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district_zip = #{district_zip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_delivery_address_enable = #{user_delivery_address_enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delivery_address = #{delivery_address,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where user_delivery_address_id = #{user_delivery_address_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_delivery_address_id, user_id, province_zip, city_zip, district_zip, user_delivery_address_enable, delivery_address from user_delivery_address where user_delivery_address_id = #{user_delivery_address_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select user_delivery_address_id, user_id, province_zip, city_zip, district_zip, user_delivery_address_enable, delivery_address from user_delivery_address
